SELECT
FROM contract_counterpart WHERE is_deleted = 0
AND name like concat('%', #{counterpart.name}, '%')
AND nature_category like concat('%', #{counterpart.natureCategory}, '%')
AND first_cooperation_date like concat('%', #{counterpart.firstCooperationDateString}, '%')
AND id_number like concat('%', #{counterpart.idNumber}, '%')
AND legal_representative like concat('%', #{counterpart.legalRepresentative}, '%')
AND DATE_FORMAT(establish_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = #{counterpart.establishDateString}

SELECT
FROM contract_counterpart WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id IN (SELECT c.counterpart_id FROM contract_counterpart_setting c WHERE c.contract_id = #{id})

SELECT
FROM contract_counterpart WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND id = #{id}

FROM contract_counterpart WHERE is_deleted = 0 AND unified_social_credit_code = #{unified_social_credit_code}
